import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Banner.css' import instance from '../../axios' import { apiKey } from '../../constants/constants' function Banner() { const [movie, setMovie] = useState() useEffect(() => { instance.get(`trending/all/week?api_key=${apiKey}&language=en-US`).then((response)=>{ setMovie(response.data.results[0]) }) }, []) console.log(movie) console.log(typeof(movie)) con return (
